subject: INTERNATIONAL FUND TRANSFER
body:
INTERNATIONAL FUND TRANSFER / AUDIT UNIT OF UNITED NATIONS ORGANIZATION
(WORLD BANK ASSISTED PROGRAM)
DIRECTORATE OF INTERNATIONAL PAYMENT & TRANSFERS
405 EAST 42ND STREET,
NEW YORK, NY, 10017, USA.
WIRE TRANSFER / AUDIT UNIT
Our Ref.: WB/NF/UN/XX028
IRREVOCABLE RELEASE OF YOUR PAYMENT OF $45.7MILLION
Following a Copy of your CONTRACT/INHERITANCE PAYMENT FILE with
REFERENCE NUMBER (CONTRACT/ INHERITANCE /PED/0099/2022) in your favor
as the bonafide beneficiary of this said Contract/Inheritance fund of
$45.7Million which is still in the custody of the WORLD BANK(WB) as
being forwarded to us by the WHITE HOUSE PAYMENT CONFIRMATION /
VERIFICATION and BOARD of DIRECTORS of CONTRACT PAYMENT PANEL
COMMITTEE(CPPC).
Based on our direct findings, confirmation and verification from your
Contract/Inheritance Payment file, Office of the UNITED NATIONS(UN)
FUND MONITORING DEPT. was meant to understand that you have fulfilled
and satisfied all the requisite and necessary conditions by making all
the required/needed payment which is supposed to guarantee/warrant the
immediate release of this said Contract/Inheritance fund of
$45.7Million to you.
Sequel to this Development, Office of the UNITED NATIONS (UN) FUND
MONITORING DEPT hereby inform you that your Contract/Inheritance Fund
of $45.7Million is ready and waiting to be released to you. All that
is now required from you is to make a trip to the WORLD BANK(WB)
HEADQUARTER in GENEVA, SWITZERLAND to sign your FUND RELEASE ORDER
BOND CERTIFICATE to enable your Contract / Inheritance fund of
$45.7Million to be released to you immediately upon signing of your
FUND RELEASE ORDER BOND CERTIFICATE. The Office of the UNITED
NATIONS(UN) FUND MONITORING DEPT. wish to bring to your urgent
attention that an INVITATION LETTER will be provided to you to
facilitate your VISA PROCESSING and PROCUREMENT whereby you are ready
for the trip.
Alternatively, the Office of the UNITED NATIONS(UN) FUND MONITORING
DEPT. want you to understand that you can also seek or apply for the
service of the WORLD BANK(WB) ATTORNEY / LAWYER who can render this
service to you if you are unable to make a trip to the WORLD BANK(WB)
HEADQUARTER in GENEVA, SWITZERLAND.
You can contact the CHIEF LEGAL DIRECTOR/COUNSEL of the WORLD
BANK(WB), JUSTICE(MRS) ROSLYN WOOD, with below contact information for
further confirmation and directives if your are unable to make the
trip.
JUSTICE (MRS) ROSLYN WOOD.
CHIEF LEGAL DIRECTOR/COUNSEL
WORLD BANK (WB) LEGAL DEPT
EMAIL---------  
jroslynwood@gmail.com
In line with this development, You are also advised to provide us with
under-listed items:
1. YOUR FULL NAME
2. RESIDENTIAL ADDRESS
3. MOBILE/CELL PHONE NUMBER
4. DATE OF BIRTH / OCCUPATION / POSITION
5. SCAN COPY OF ANY OF YOUR MEANS OF IDENTIFICATION SUCH AS
INTERNATIONAL PASSPORT, DRIVER'S LICENSE OR OFFICIAL IDENTIFICATION
CARD.
Office of the UNITED NATIONS FUND MONITORING DEPT wish to bring to
your urgent attention that the ONLY and FINAL PAYMENT
MEANS/ALTERNATIVE for you in receiving this said Contract Fund of
$45.7Million is either by ATM CARD, ONLINE BANK TRANSFER, CASH PAYMENT
DELIVERY or by BANK TO BANK TRANSFER to your nominated Bank account
where the WORLD BANK has to transfer the funds in whole or in bits
direct to your nominated Bank account or have one of their
Correspondent Banks across the Globe transfer said fund direct to your
nominated Bank account in whole or in bits without any
difficulty/financial surveillance.
If you are unable to make a trip to SWITZERLAND, and contact the CHIEF
LEGAL DIRECTOR/COUNSEL of the WORLD BANK(WB) JUSTICE(MRS) ROSLYN WOOD,
She will represent you by visiting the WORLD BANK(WB) HEADQUARTER in
GENEVA, SWITZERLAND to sign your FUND RELEASE ORDER BOND CERTIFICATE
on your behalf, and also have the WORLD BANK(WB) or their duly
appointed Correspondent Bank remit your Contract/Inheritance Payment
to your nominated Bank account. Kindly feel free to ask any Question
in any area you want us to clarify you and as well seek any possible
help which you feel we can render you in this regard.
Thanks in anticipation of your Positive and swift response.
NOTE: RESPONSE SHOULD BE MADE BEFORE IT'S TOO LATE. AND DON'T FORGET,
WHILE YOU ARE SENDING YOUR DATA REQUESTED ABOVE TO US, ALSO SEND EMAIL
TO THE WORLD BANK(WB) ATTORNEY / LAWYER WHOSE EMAIL ADDRESS AND DETAIL
IS PROVIDED ABOVE.
CONGRATULATIONS!
FROM THE OFFICE OF HONORABLE SECRETARY-GENERAL OF THE UNITED
NATIONS(UN), MR. ANTONIO GUTERRES.

subject: Re:   INTERNATIONAL FUND TRANSFER
body:
Dear Mr. Antonio Guterres,

I am writing in response to your email regarding the release of my contract fund. I appreciate your efforts and the transparency of this process.

Here are the details you requested:

Full Name: John Doe
Address: 123 Main Street, Anytown, USA
Mobile Cell Phone Number: +1-555-555-5555
Date of Birth: January 1, 1980
Occupation Position: Software Engineer

Unfortunately, I do not have a scanner at home to provide a copy of my identification. However, I can assure you that all the information provided is accurate and verifiable.

Regarding the trip to Geneva for signing the Fund Release Order Bond, due to my current work commitments, it would be difficult for me to travel at this time. Therefore, I would like to apply for the service of World Bank's attorney lawyer Justice Mrs Roslyn Wood as suggested in your email.

I will also send an email to Justice Mrs Roslyn Wood providing her with these details and requesting her assistance in this matter.

Thank you once again for your assistance and guidance in this matter. Please let me know if there are any other requirements or steps that need to be taken.

Best wishes,
Nancy
